clips.element: return React.createElement('div', { style: { position: 'absolute', top: '30%', left: '50%', transform: 'translate(-50%, -50%)', opacity: 1, fontSize: '48px', color: 'red' } }, 'STATIC - Should appear at 5.5s');

return React.createElement('div', { style: { position: 'absolute', top: '70%', left: '50%', transform: 'translate(-50%, -50%)', opacity: SW.interp(5.5, 6.5, 0, 1), fontSize: '48px', color: 'white' } }, 'ANIMATED - Should fade 5.5s-6.5s');
